item.title: My First Post
item.description:
Introduction

This is bold text, and this is emphasized text.

Visit the Hugo website!

Also, this page is helpful for getting started with Hugo.

This is a test to see if I can link to other repositories!

Really old Github Project on Chilean Glacier melt.

And this is how I might want to display an image from a project.

item.title: My First Post
item.description:
Why am I here?

As an avid traveler and water nerd, I’ve been wanting to combine the two subjects into this passion project for some time now…
